definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: causat., Sir 49:10, Sir 40:19; Ar. farixa II. hatch, also sprout, farxun young of bird (v. [[אֶפְרׂחַ]] infr.), twig, sprout; As. pirḫu, n. sprout;—on mng. cf. GFM:JBL x (1891), 57);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[פ]] Ez Eze 7:10 +, etc; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִפְרַח]] Ho 14:6 +, 3 fpl. [[תִּפְרַחְנׇה]] Is 66:14, etc.; Inf. abs. [[פָּרׂחַ]] Is 35:2; cstr. [[בִּפְרׂךְ]] Ps 92:8; Pt. f. [[פּׂרַ֫חַת]] Ge 40:10; —bud, sprout, send out shoots, of vine Ge 40:10 (E), Ho 14:8 (sim.), Ct So 6:11, So 7:13; fig-tree Hb Hab 3:17 (< LXX We Now [[תִּפְרֶח]]); rods Nu 17:5, Nu 17:8; metaph. of restored Isr. Ho 14:6, Is 27:6, cf. of bones Is 66:14 ([[כַּדֶּשֶׁא]]); of righteous Ps 72:7, Ps 92:13, Pr 11:28; of wicked ([[כְּמוֹ עֵשֶׂב]]) Ps 92:8; also of steppe ([[עֲרָבָה]]) Is 35:1, [[פָּרׂחַ תִּפְרַח]] v:Is 35:2; fig. of judgment Ho 10:4 ([[כָּראׁשׁ]]; but on text v. Now); of [[זׇדוֹן]] (q.v. p. 268) Ez Eze 7:10.
